title: Paper Accepted by TMC
content: One first-author paper entitled AgentsCoMerge: Large Language Model Empowered Collaborative Decision Making for Ramp Merging was accepted by IEEE Transactions on Mobile Computing (TMC)!

title: Paper Accepted by WCM
content: One first-author paper entitled Collaborative Perception for Autonomous Driving: Challenges, Possible Solutions and Opportunities was accepted by IEEE Wireless Communications Magazine (WCM)!

title: New Project Launched: Multi-Agent Autonomous Driving
content: 🔥🔥🔥 We launched a new project about Multi-Agent Autonomous Driving! This project will continuously collect papers from recent years in the field of multi-agent autonomous driving and is the most comprehensive repo in this field! Welcome to Star ⭐️ & Contribute!

title: PhD Qualification Success
content: Senkang passed the PhD Qualifying Examination (QE)! He is now a PhD candidate! 🎉🎉🎉

title: Paper Accepted by ICRA'25
content: One co-authored paper entitled Direct-CP: Directed Collaborative Perception for Connected and Autonomous Vehicles via Proactive Attention was accepted by The 2025 IEEE International Conference on Robotics and Automation (ICRA'25)!

title: AAAI'25 Oral Presentation
content: Our paper accepted by AAAI'25 was selected for Oral Presentation! Congratulations again 🎉!

title: Paper Accepted by ToN
content: One co-authored paper  was accepted by IEEE/ACM Transactions on Networking (ToN)!

title: Paper Accepted by AAAI'25
content: Congratulations 🎉! One first-author paper entitled CP-Guard: Malicious Agent Detection and Defense in Collaborative Bird's Eye View Perception was accepted by The 39th Annual AAAI Conference on Artificial Intelligence (AAAI'25), see you in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, USA 🇺🇸!

title: Paper Accepted by IEEE TITS
content: One paper was accepted by IEEE Transactions on Intelligent Transportation Systems (TITS), congratulations 🎉!!!

title: IEEE ComSoc Student Grant Award
content: Senkang was awarded the IEEE ComSoc Student Grant to support his conference travel.

title: Paper Accepted by IEEE TMC
content: One paper was accepted by IEEE Transactions on Mobile Computing (TMC)!

title: Two Papers Accepted by GLOBECOM'24
content: Two papers were accepted by GLOBECOM'24, see you in Cape Town, South Africa 🇿🇦!

title: Institutional Research Tuition Grant
content: Senkang was awarded the Institutional Research Tuition Grant, nearly HK$170,000.

title: Relocation to Hong Kong
content: Congratulations to Senkang 🎉, finally moved to Hong Kong 🇭🇰🇭🇰🇭🇰 to start his new career!

title: InnoHK Award Funding
content: Thanks to Prof. Fang's strong support, Senkang received the InnoHK Award Funding, around HK$900,000 from the Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region to support his research and PhD career.

title: Graduation from BIT
content: Senkang graduated from Beijing Institute of Technology. Thanks to all the professors, senior students and friends who helped him in the past four years.

title: National Scholarship Award
content: Senkang was awarded the National Scholarship for his top 1% academic performance in the whole department, which is the highest honor for Chinese university students.
